start: To start, please provide your credentials in this format: /start [apikey] [secretkey] [login] [password] - Get API key and secret key from Freedom24 Auth API - Use your regular Freedom24 login and password (we will calculate and store the SID for you) Note: your credentials will be stored in the database. Do not enable "Allow trading and submission of orders" for security reasons
created: Credentials saved. Hit /start again to change them anytime. See /portfolio to see your portfolio

subscribe.usage: Please provide a ticker to subscribe to: /subscribe AAPL
subscribe.error: ❌ Failed to subscribe to ${ticker}. Please try again later.

unsubscribe.invalid: ❌ Invalid subscription number. Use /subs to see your current subscriptions.
unsubscribe.error: ❌ Failed to unsubscribe from ${ticker}. Please try again later.

list.empty: No active subscriptions. Use /subscribe [ticker] to start tracking a ticker.
list.error: ❌ Failed to fetch subscriptions. Please try again later.

setup.usage: Please provide a ticker and price condition: /notify AAPL ≥150 /notify AMD.US <160
setup.already_exists: You already have a notification set for ${ticker} ${condition}
setup.error: ❌ Failed to set notification for ${ticker}. Please try again later.

remove.invalid: ❌ Invalid notification number. Use /notifications to see your current notifications.
remove.error: ❌ Failed to remove notification. Please try again later.

list.empty: No active notifications. Use /notify [ticker] [<|≥][price] to set up price alerts.
list.error: ❌ Failed to fetch notifications. Please try again later.
